snippet.title: Fableverse Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Fableverse is a incremental idler creature-collector, where you mine, train, breed, augment, and trade creatures, in order to increase the outputs of your operation. Collect all the creatures, called Fables, in the name of science within the region of Soltera. Discover and buy upgrades to further your output.

Coming Soon to Steam. Wishlist Now: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2233750/Fableverse/
